column1: The Purple Pig////We ordered the Crispy Pig's Ears
column5: and Sicilian Iris. We LOVED the broccoli and octopus the most. It's a perfect balance of flavors: salty
column7: full of umami. We really want to know how to make those broccoli ;) The Pig's ears dish was admittedly a bit underwhelming because it was the most hyped dish based on other reviews. It was still unique nevertheless and I would highly recommend trying it anyways. The pork belly was melt in your mouth good. Finally
column8: the desert (Sicilian iris) was really unique and rich. Overall
column9: very satisfied with the food we got.
